verses.verse: <S%H7592>Ask<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> in the <S%H4456>spring<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H6213>makes<s%> storm <S%H2385>clouds,<s%> and he <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H4456>rain<s%> <S%H1653>showers<s%> to <S%H376>everyone<s%> for the <S%H6212>plants<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

For the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H205>vanity,<s%> and the <S%H7080>diviners<s%> have <S%H2372>seen<s%> a <S%H8267>lie;<s%> and they have <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H2472>dreams.<s%> They <S%H5162>comfort<s%> in <S%H1892>vain.<s%> Therefore they <S%H5265>go<s%> their way like <S%H6629>sheep.<s%> They are <S%H6031>oppressed,<s%> because there is no <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%>

My <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against the <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the male <S%H6260>goats;<s%> For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has <S%H6485>visited<s%> his <S%H5739>flock,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and will <S%H7760>make<s%> them as his <S%H1935>majestic<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

From him will come <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H6438>cornerstone,<s%> from him the <S%H3489>nail,<s%> from him the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H7198>bow,<s%> from him every <S%H5065>ruler<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

They shall be as <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H947>men,<s%> treading down <S%H2916>muddy<s%> <S%H2351>streets<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle;<s%> and they shall <S%H3898>fight,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is with <S%H7392>them;<s%> and the riders on <S%H5483>horses<s%> will be <S%H3001>confounded.<s%>

"I will <S%H1396>strengthen<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and I will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and I will bring them <S%H3427>back;<s%> for I have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H834>them;<s%> and they will be as though I had not cast them <S%H2186>off:<s%> for I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and I will hear <S%H6030>them.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will be like a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H3820>man,<s%> and their heart will <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> as through <S%H3196>wine;<s%> <S%H1121>yes,<s%> their children will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1523>it,<s%> and rejoice. Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
I will <S%H8319>signal<s%> for <S%H6908>them,<s%> and gather <S%H6299>them;<s%> for I have redeemed <S%H7235>them;<s%> and they will increase as they have <S%H7235>increased.<s%>

I will <S%H2232>sow<s%> them among the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> and they will <S%H2142>remember<s%> me in far <S%H4801>countries;<s%> and they will <S%H2421>live<s%> with their <S%H1121>children,<s%> and will <S%H7725>return.<s%>

I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> also out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them out of <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon;<s%> and there <S%H4672>won't<s%> be room enough for them.

He will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H6869>affliction,<s%> and will <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H1530>waves<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and all the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> will dry <S%H3001>up;<s%> and the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> will be brought <S%H3381>down,<s%> and the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H5493>depart.<s%>
I will <S%H1396>strengthen<s%> them in <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and they will walk up and <S%H1980>down<s%> in his <S%H8034>name,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
